item.title: Bridging Wireless & Ethernet networks with a Raspberry Pi
item.description: We recently acquired a second hand Dell laser printer, which was timely: our inkjet printer is a little long in the tooth, and is starting to require more frequent head cleaning and nozzle alignment, both of which use that liquid gold we call “ink”.
